bio:
We’re a fast growing mobile specialist that’s dedicated to becoming a true partner to each of our clients. A partner that can create amazing applications while still providing industry leading account management and customer support services.

The experience of launching over 100 applications has taught us that nothing beats a client-centered and communication-driven process that combines your industry knowledge with our mobile expertise.

Only that type of partnership can lead to mobile solutions that are as outstanding as our clients’ visions for them.

Communication: In person at our New York City office or by phone, email, Skype, or instant messenger. Whatever is most convenient for you! We do ask that clients provide comprehensive feedback on milestones within 3-5 business days so we can keep your project on schedule. 

Contract: We generally work on a fixed-contract as an independent contractor. All work performed for the client under our agreement is 100% owned by them including all intellectual property rights.

abstrac: You name it, I translate it
bio: Being born in a multi-cultural family (mother from Puerto Rico, father from Ohio, USA) , I learned both English and Spanish from an early age, with formal studies in school and college (BA in Spanish).  I was raised in Madrid, Spain, and went back to Puerto Rico after finishing college, which has given me an understanding of the idiosincracy and idiomatic and cultural differences of these Spanish-speaking cultures.  I can offer translation in Castellano (European Spanish), Latin American Spanish, or an in-between "neuter" Spanish.

abstrac: vTechnoLabs is a top-class mobile apps development company
bio:
vTechnoLabs is a top-class mobile apps development company with presence in US, UK and India. vTechnoLabs has been associated clients across the globe, developing competitive apps and enabling them to reach out to their customers in a better way. We at vTechnoLabs believe in buidling strong ties with our clients that helps builds trust in the organization giving way to a mutually beneficial relationship.

We at vTechnoLabs, work together to bring out the best in apps development. Whether the application is on Facebook, mobile or website, our team of experts work together informing and updating the client at each step to help realize the client's app idea. Our solutions help our clients to reach out to their customers in a more convenient way.

vTechnoLabs has had the privilege to work with some of the most known brands across the globe such as Siemens, Essilor, SOS etc.
